lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Delegates agreed to shelve discussion of IADB reforms until the half-yearly International Monetary Fund and World Bank meetings in two weeks time in Washington at which a decision will be urgently sought in order to maintain credit flows to the recession-hit region.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.S. Treasury Secretary James Baker said Monday the United States, as 34.5 pct shareholder and provider of the bulk of the Bank's resources, should have more say in approving loans and conditioned a nine billion dlr increase in its contribution on approving the reforms.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But despite the impasse, some Latin American delegates including Mexican Finance Minister Gustavo Petricioli said they were optimistic a compromise agreement could be reached next month.
